LANDING.DESCRIPTION: Hi, I’m Giuseppe Cino and I am creative frontend developer based in Saarlouis, Germany. I enjoy bring ideas into real life.

PROJECTS.JOIN: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
PROJECTS.POLLO: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
PROJECTS.CRM: A very Simple Customer Relationship Management system working with CRUD functionality.
PROJECTS.POKEDEX: Based on the PokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.
